mdRecord.dcterms:title: Our benevolent feudalism / by W. J. Ghent
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ghent, William J. (William James), 1866-1942
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Utopias and other forecasts.--Combination and coalescence.--Our magnates.--Our farmers and wage-earners.--Our makers of law.--Our interpreters of law.--Our moulders of opinion.--General social changes.--Transition and fulfilment.
"The germ of this book was contained in an article published in the Independent, April 3, 1902."--Pref.
